channel.title: Need Coder for [PI]
channel.description:
I recently downloaded the sacred pk source and client. i found some bugs. like when i wield chaotics, it says i am still unarmed. The defenders are in the rong hand or same hand as main sword. I also cannot spawn all the items, i can spawn bandos, phats, others, but not d claws, primal. Primal and all other dungeon armour when worn the character sticks out of the armour.
if you can help add RsPsVeTeRaN on skype

item.title: Need Coder for [PI]
item.dc:creator: @SheaTheDude SheaTheDude
item.description:
@SheaTheDude wrote:

whenever the items do that…that means that the version of the item don’t match the version of your source…for example you cant put a 317 item in a 562 because they arent version matched for that cache…just search an item database and then you could find the item id along with the version of the item… hope this helped

Read full topic
